body.name: Full Body Length Mirrors for Walls, 12x12 4pcs Acrylic Plexiglass Wall-Mounted Stick On Frameless Square Makeup Large Long Mirror Home Workout Gym Hallway Mirror Dorm Floor Tile Self Adhesive
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 10 hrs 11 mins
features: ULTRA THIN & FLEXIBLE: made of acrylic material, acrylic mirror can be bent freely, not easy to break, safer than regular glass mirror. Acrylic mirror wall sticker very light and easy to stick to the wall,will not break very safe for child and pets,convenient to move when move place, thicken double-side adhesive viscosity is stronger, will not easy fall off.
DIY as you like:Set of 4 pieces, each size is approx 12*12 inch/30*30cm,upgrade thickness is 0.08inch/0.2cm, you can buy several sets for bigger area.

MULTIPLE USES: You can decorate your bedroom, wardrobe, hallway, living room, bathroom, vanity any place you need to add brilliance to your room!It is a makeup mirror, Dressing Mirror, is also a decorative mirror!Simple, easy to install, and does not take up space. can be use as interior decoration, beautification, makes the interior space more spacious by mirror reflection, not for use as realistic mirror

Note:There is a protective film on the surface,After sticking it, tear off the protective film, remember not to wipe the mirror surface ofen, which may cause scratches. We will send you a cloth to clean it. Please get it wet before you clean the mirrors. The best way to clean the mirrors is to use a hair dryer.
body.description: 12 Inch Acrylic Mirror Tiles Flexible mirror stickers The mirror sticker, the size is 12 x 12 inches, and the upgraded thickness is 0.08 inches/0.2cm.Thickened double-sided adhesive is more sticky and not easy to fall off.Acrylic mirror stickers are light and easy to install, not take up space, not easy to break, and are very safe for children and pets.You can decorate your bedroom, wardrobe, corridor, living room, bathroom, dressing table, any place that needs to add luster to your room.MULTIPLE USES You can decorate your bedroom, wardrobe, hallway, living room, bathroom, vanity any place you need to add brilliance to your room!It is a makeup mirror, Dressing Mirror, is also a decorative mirror!Simple, easy to install, and does not take up space. can be use as interior decoration, beautification, makes the interior space more spacious by mirror reflection, not for use as realistic mirror Three, four, or more pieces of mirror tiles can be combined as you wish, whatever square, rectangle, or in other shapes. Not only a door mirror or body mirror also a full body mirror that can decorate your house and illuminate your beauty. ULTRA FLEXIBLE Made of acrylic material, acrylic mirror can be bent freely, not easy to break, safer than regular glass mirror. Acrylic mirror wall sticker very light and easy to stick to the wall,will not break very safe for child and pets,convenient to move when move place, thicken double-side adhesive viscosity is stronger, will not easy fall off. ULTRA THICK Our acrylic mirrors was 0.08inch/2mm. This will be much thicker and clearer. the reflection effect is not deformed, and the image brightness is higher. Others' will much thinner and will be easy dim and distorting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I’m a hairstylist
reviews.reviewText: I love this mirror for me a at home hairstylist just trying to provide a cute quick aesthetic to my content very cute and easy to assemble I think I’ll buy two more

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Kept falling off
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to use as a hallway mirror but the mirrored sections kept falling off the wall. The double sided tape provided isn't very strong. I don't mind over paying for 4 pieces of plexiglass as long as it looks nice but you would think they can at least provide some stronger tape.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable. Works well for its purpose.
reviews.reviewText: Affordable. Easy to put together - does come in 4 pieces so don’t anticipate a full length mirror that is in one piece, as it is not. Appearance in mirror still looks nice however. Good deal for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Blurry mirror & doesn’t stick
reviews.reviewText: Falls right off. Blurry warped mirror. Waste of money!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars No. Just no.
reviews.reviewText: Would not recommend. Nice idea but unfortunately the mirror looks like a funhouse mirror unless you’re standing right up on it. I would return if we hadn’t already attached it to the wall. I give it two stars for the idea of a compact mirror but gotta do better than this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars easy to apply
reviews.reviewText: easy to apply but a lot smaller than i thought

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than I imagined
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Looks good, clear imageI was concerned on the quality since it’s not glass but I honestly love itKid friendly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to apply nice bedroom features

reviews.reviewTitle: Specchio che fa venire il mal di mare
reviews.reviewText: Ok che il prezzo era basso, ma da un quadrato all’altro si storce tutta la figura… uno specchio che non specchia.Pessimo

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great service and excellent quality and easy to fit looks great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Great product but be aware of scratches
reviews.reviewText: Arrived pretty quickly and easy to put together, only downside is seeing some scratches when tearing off the protective film - shame couldn't spot them earlier. Returned for now but will consider similar or even same purchase to replace.
